bibl.title: Despatch from Theodore A. Rosenbush to Frederick W. Seward, February 15, 1869
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p: Vice Commercial Agency of the United States of America at Sierra Leone, February 15th, 1869.

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of despatch No 9, dated Decbr 29th last, informing me that my despatch No 17, 24th Nov: last— had been received, and directing me to number my despatches to the Department of State consecutively and to keep them separate from all other correspondence.
Mr. Henry Rider the Commercial Agent at this Settlement is expected daily, I leaves the yearly reports to that Officer's arrival.

I have the honor to be,
Sir,
Your obedient Servant
Rosenbush
U.S. Vice Comml Agt:
div1.fw:
F. W. Seward Esqre
Asst: Secretary
Department of State.
